name: Frank the Miner
description:
Enter the mine with Frank the Miner, go hunting for precious gems and treasures and set your personal record. Use light sources to best deal with puzzles, use bombs against enemies and avoid traps.

key features

* collect precious gems

* recover the treasures to go to the next level

* use light sources to avoid the traps

* Go smart and think well before making a move

* use bombs with intelligence

* made with beautiful hd graphics
